entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
